Biography

FIRST-YEAR (2024): Appeared in 34 games, making 32 starts predominantly in Center field … Pitched in nine contests, including four starts on the mound totaling a 4.18 ERA over 23.2 Innings pitched … At the plate, he slashed .235/.361/.677, recorded one home run, 19 RBIs and lead the team with 19 walks … Finished 1-for-4 with two runs scored in his collegiate debut against No. 11 Misericordia (2/26) … Collected his first career multi-hit contest behind a 2-for-3 performance versus Kenyon College (3/4) … Tallied a base hit, RBI, and run scored in the Bears’ victory over Rosemont College (3/13) … Went 2-for-3 with two RBIs and a run scored versus No. 4 Salisbury (3/16) … Collected his first collegiate home run behind a 2-for-4 performance including three runs scored and three RBIs in a Bears’ victory over Gettysburg (3/30) … Recorded a 18-game on base streak from March 8th through April 13th which included a six-game hitting streak … Tied a career-high with three RBIs behind a 1-for-3 performance at the plate in a team’s victory over Haverford (4/10) … On the mound, he pitched in an inning in his debut striking out two batters against Penn State Behrend (3/5) … Pitched a clean inning of relief versus Lebanon Valley (3/7) … Made his first collegiate start versus Gwynedd Mercy (3/26) and pitched three shutout innings allowing just one hit and striking out two batters … Earned his first career save after recording the final two outs versus Gettysburg (3/30) … Allowed just one hit over two clean innings of relief against Washington College (4/13) … Scattered six hits over 5.1 innings while striking out three batters against Swarthmore (4/16).

Before Ursinus: Graduated from Cape Henlopen High School… Honor Roll

Personal: Born August 14, 2005… From Lewes, DE…son of Suzie and Jim Ross…Has one sibling, Brielle…Engineering Major

Why Ursinus?

Ursinus has a beautiful campus and great people.

Favorite Hobbies: Baseball, and lifting

Favorite Food: Chicken

Favorite Song:

Favorite Athlete: Mike Trout

Career Aspiration: Civil engineering
